description:
This course will help you understand the core principles that need to be applied for becoming an investor in securities.

Investing as you know it is one of the ways in which you can generate passive income through careful scrutiny, selection and monitoring. In fact, if you take this course, you will realize that, whether markets go up or down, there’s money to be made.

The trick is to allocate funds, invest, stay invested, earn interest, dividends and capital appreciation, all for other people’s hard work!

This is a results oriented course, where in under an hour you can go from a person with little understanding of investing to someone who knows the fundamentals, and can use it to his advantage. These skills can be applied to making your investments at the earliest.

If you're interested in learning about the different asset classes you can invest in and which one would work well for you, this course will help you get started and running fast.

The course is self-paced, and is structured in a manner that the core principles are delivered using engaging presentations, that use visual aids where appropriate to get the information across effectively.

Also in this course, I explain tactics for investing, things normally used by pros such as financial advisors and fund managers. You can aim to become your own financial advisor, as I introduce you to the concepts of Portfolio management and risk diversification.

Although the course at the time of initial release is under 1 hour in length, newer videos will be added on a regular basis.

The objective of this course is to help the beginner lose the newbie investor status in under an hour!! You will begin to talk in financial terms fast!

Also, by applying the principles, you will be in a position to make profits earned passively! Need any more convincing?
title: Smart Investing Series: Investing Principles for Beginners
